About Me

Alan Bedoya

BIO

Creating something out of nothing is such a powerful thrill. That's why I love building beautiful projects. What I use to create these websites and applications are, JavaScript, JavaScript frameworks like Vue, React, and Angular. Also of course HTML, CSS, and CSS preprocessor SASS. Besides coding I love traveling, making music, and cooking. Not including that I'm always on the hunt for coffee. If you have a great idea that needs to be turned into a beautiful project, send me an email. I would love to hear from you!
